about_the_game:
Load your die in this dicebuilding roguelike all about creating and exploiting combos! Every face on your set of dice can be a unique weapon in your battle to the top. Duel enemies each with their own armament of dice and smash their faces, outplay their strategies, and deal deadly damage to take them out. Steal faces from enemies you beat to trade in at the store or incorporate into your winning strategy. The right combination of dice can let you tank damage, reroll faces, create new dice from scratch and much more, but only if you play them right!



Forget being limited by a class type, in Load Roll Die your only limit is what faces you find each time you play. Become a tank by adding shields to your dice, explore wizardry by calling down lightning from above, become a face stealing rogue, or mix them all together with something else!
The die is the limit!

Earn faces from enemies, shops, and chests you encounter along the way. Add them to your dice set and figure out the best way to play. Each run you encounter different maps, different dice, and different synergies to take down your opponents!

Beat runs to unlock new looks for your dice and custom gameplay modifiers that increase difficulty or cause chaos!

In Load Roll Die counting on luck isn’t enough -- Loading the dice in your favor is the only way to win.

Features:

- Dozens of enemies spread out over nine different realms to try your hand against: from a mad scientist creating life to take yours to a frozen yeti fighting with a flurry of kicks
- Unlock new dice skins by beating runs to customize your set
- Over a hundred different dice faces to build your best combos with
- Run modifiers for a customizable new game+ experience
- Accessibility options for visuals, sound, and difficulty adjustment

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04, 18.04 or CentOS 7
  • Processor: Run cat /proc/cpuinfo, if you see sse2 you should be good
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
  • Additional Notes: You may be on your own somewhat, but I do use Linux. The game is still in development so these may change. In reality though it runs on a potato it's a turn based game.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20 is out isn't it? That's cool
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

short_description: Stop, swap and roll your dice in this Roguelite Dice-builder! Steal dice faces from your enemies and use them to create the perfect dice set for taking down your opponents. Roll and combine your dice to create explosions, freeze faces, duplicate dice and more!
